### Macro Name
 - A Clear and Precise Name for the Macro.
```cs
ex.
**Name:** Swift Summon
```
### Job Title and Class
 - The Exact Job Title and Class the Macro applies to.

```cs
ex. 
 **Job:** DPS
**Class:** Archer
```
### Macro Description
 - A Clear and precise description of the Macro.

### Macro Code
 - The code used for the Macro
